news.title: Year In Review: Three-Year Anniversary
news.caption: Our annual "Year in Review" article shares an overview of how the product, team, and community have evolved since this time last year. Give it a read for some interesting statistics, previews of upcoming work, and a recap of things you might have missed from the past few months.

news.title: V12 Patreon Feature Vote
news.caption: Check out our V12 Patreon Feature Vote where Foundry patrons can help decide Foundry's fate and what features we start working on next!

news.title: Overview Video
news.caption: Watch a comprehensive video overview which summarizes the features of Foundry Virtual Tabletop.

news.title: Version 11 Stable Release
news.caption: Version 11 Stable 1 has now been released! Check out our release notes for everything you need to know.

news.title: Introduction to Module Sub-Types
news.caption: Foundry Virtual Tabletop  V11 adds support for Modules to extend the list of sub-types available to certain Documents in much the same way that Systems can. Learn how to take advantage of this great new feature.

featuredContent.title: Heretic's Guide to Devotion
featuredContent.caption: Enjoy 200 pages of divinely inspired content aimed at bringing the divine to life in DnD5E! From zealous cults and relic hunts to divine player options and celestial horrors, this module has everything you need to make the divine matter.
